me.dobrakmato.plugins.pexel.PexelCore

Class AdvancedMinigameArena

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.dobrakmato.plugins.pexel.PexelCore.ProtectedArea
      • me.dobrakmato.plugins.pexel.PexelCore.MinigameArena
        • me.dobrakmato.plugins.pexel.PexelCore.AdvancedMinigameArena
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MatchmakingGame, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class AdvancedMinigameArena
extends MinigameArena
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Arena that has built-in support for pre-game lobby and stuff... Also implements Listener and calls PluginManager.registerEvents(Listener, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin) in constructor.
    Author:
    Mato Kormuth

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean autoReset
      Specifies, if the arena should call reset() function automaticaly when game ends.
      protected boolean countdownCanCancel
      Specifies if the countdown should be canceled, if a player leaves arena and there is not enough players to start game, but the countdown is alredy running.
      protected java.lang.String countdownFormat
      Chat format for countdown message.
      protected int countdownLenght
      Lenght of countdown in seconds.
      protected int countdownTaskId 
      protected int countdownTimeLeft
      Time left to game start.
      protected org.bukkit.Location gameSpawn
      Location of this arena game spawn.
      protected org.bukkit.Location lobbyLocation
      Location of this arena lobby.
      protected int minimalPlayers
      Amount of players, that is required to start the countdown.
      protected boolean playersCanJoinAfterStart
      Specifies if players can join the game after the game was started.
      protected boolean playersCanRespawn
      Specifies if players can respawn in this arena, or not.
      protected boolean shouldTeleportPlayers
      Specifies if the players should be teleported to gameSpawn and lobbyLocation automaticaly.

        Returns:

      • getWorld

        public org.bukkit.World getWorld()

      • onCountdownStart

        public void onCountdownStart()
        Called when countdown starts.

      • reset

        public final void reset()
        Reseta arena basic things. Calls onReset() at the end of this function!
        If you want to extend reset function, override onReset() function.

      • onReset

        public void onReset()
        Called right after the arena resets it's basic things, after reset() was called. Don't forget to change arena's state to GameState.WAITING_EMPTY after reset.

      • onCountdownCancelled

        public void onCountdownCancelled()
        Called when countdown stops.

      • onNotEnoughPlayers

        public void onNotEnoughPlayers()
        Called each time, a player joins arena and there is not enough players for countdown start.

      • onGameStart

        public void onGameStart()
        Called when game should start its logic. Called when lobby countdown has reached zero and there is enough players.

      • onGameEnd

        public void onGameEnd()
        Called when last player lefts the arena. Should call reset() function if autoReset is set to false (false by default).

      • onPlayerJoin

        public void onPlayerJoin(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Called when players join the arena. Also checks if there are enough players, if so, calls onGameStart(). If not, calls onNotEnoughPlayers().
        Specified by:
        onPlayerJoin in interface MatchmakingGame
        Overrides:
        onPlayerJoin in class MinigameArena

      • onPlayerLeft

        public void onPlayerLeft(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Called when player left the arena. If is arena in LOBBY/WAITING_PLAYERS state, and flag countdownCanCancel is set to true, stops the countdown.
        Specified by:
        onPlayerLeft in interface MatchmakingGame
        Overrides:
        onPlayerLeft in class MinigameArena
